mapper.select: SELECT s.title, l.location, h.name, u.nickname, SUM(replace(r.rent_price,',','')) AS totalPrice FROM rent_place_reservation_tb AS r JOIN location_tb AS l ON r.location_id = l.id JOIN hole_tb AS h ON r.hole_id = h.id JOIN show_tb AS s ON r.show_id = s.id JOIN user_tb AS u ON r.user_id = u.id WHERE r.rent_place_status = 1 GROUP BY s.title ORDER BY r.start_date ASC, r.end_date ASC

SELECT s.id, s.title,s.adult_rate,s.youth_rate, COUNT(case when t.age_group_id=2 then 1 end) * replace(s.youth_rate,',','') + COUNT(case when t.age_group_id=3 then 1 end) * replace(s.adult_rate,',','') as totalshowSales FROM ticketing_tb AS t JOIN show_tb AS s ON t.show_id = s.id JOIN show_datetime_tb AS sd ON t.show_datetime_id = sd.id WHERE t.payment_status = 1 GROUP BY s.title ORDER BY totalshowSales DESC

SELECT r.start_date, r.start_time, r.end_date, r.end_time, s.title, l.location, h.name, u.nickname, r.rent_price FROM rent_place_reservation_tb AS r JOIN location_tb AS l ON r.location_id = l.id JOIN hole_tb AS h ON r.hole_id = h.id JOIN show_tb AS s ON r.show_id = s.id JOIN user_tb AS u ON r.user_id = u.id WHERE r.rent_place_status = 1 ORDER BY r.start_date ASC, r.end_date ASC

SELECT s.start_date, s.end_date, s.id, s.title, s.adult_rate, s.youth_rate, count(case when t.age_group_id=1 then 1 end) * replace(s.youth_rate,',','') + count(case when t.age_group_id=2 then 1 end) * replace(s.adult_rate,',','') AS totalshowSales FROM ticketing_tb AS t JOIN show_tb AS s ON t.show_id = s.id JOIN show_datetime_tb AS sd ON t.show_datetime_id = sd.id WHERE t.payment_status = 1 GROUP BY s.title ORDER BY s.start_date ASC

SELECT s.start_date, s.end_date, s.id, s.title, s.adult_rate, s.youth_rate, COUNT(CASE WHEN t.age_group_id = 1 THEN 1 END) * REPLACE(s.youth_rate, ',', '') + COUNT(CASE WHEN t.age_group_id = 2 THEN 1 END) * REPLACE(s.adult_rate, ',', '') AS totalshowSales FROM ticketing_tb AS t JOIN show_tb AS s ON t.show_id = s.id JOIN show_datetime_tb AS sd ON t.show_datetime_id = sd.id WHERE t.payment_status = 1 AND s.start_date >= #{startDate} AND s.end_date <= #{endDate} GROUP BY s.title ORDER BY s.start_date ASC

SELECT s.start_date, s.end_date, s.id, s.title, s.adult_rate, s.youth_rate, COUNT(case when t.age_group_id=1 then 1 end) * replace(s.youth_rate,',','') + COUNT(case when t.age_group_id=2 then 1 end) * replace(s.adult_rate,',','') as totalshowSales FROM ticketing_tb AS t JOIN show_tb AS s ON t.show_id = s.id JOIN show_datetime_tb AS sd ON t.show_datetime_id = sd.id WHERE t.payment_status = 1 AND s.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTitle}, '%') GROUP BY s.title ORDER BY s.start_date ASC

SELECT r.start_date, r.start_time, r.end_date, r.end_time, s.title, l.location, h.name, u.nickname, r.rent_price FROM rent_place_reservation_tb AS r JOIN location_tb AS l ON r.location_id = l.id JOIN hole_tb AS h ON r.hole_id = h.id JOIN show_tb AS s ON r.show_id = s.id JOIN user_tb AS u ON r.user_id = u.id WHERE r.rent_place_status = 1 AND r.start_date >= #{startDate} AND r.end_date <= #{endDate} ORDER BY r.start_date ASC, r.end_date ASC

SELECT r.start_date, r.start_time, r.end_date, r.end_time, s.title, l.location, h.name, u.nickname, r.rent_price FROM rent_place_reservation_tb AS r JOIN location_tb AS l ON r.location_id = l.id JOIN hole_tb AS h ON r.hole_id = h.id JOIN show_tb AS s ON r.show_id = s.id JOIN user_tb AS u ON r.user_id = u.id WHERE r.rent_place_status = 1 AND h.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTitle}, '%') ORDER BY r.start_date ASC, r.end_date ASC
